description: description
Date the incubation was harvested/collected/ended. Only relevant for incubation samples.
comments / guidance for external: Date should be formatted as YYYY(-MM(-DD)). Ie, 2021-04-15, 2021-04 and 2021 are all acceptable.
notes: MIxS collection_date accepts (truncated) ISO8601. DH taking arb prec date only

description: The time of sampling, either as an instance (single point) or interval.
comments / guidance for external: Time should be entered as HH:MM(:SS) in GMT. See here for a converter: https://www.worldtimebuddy.com/pst-to-gmt-converter
notes: MIxS collection_date accepts (truncated) ISO8601. DH taking seconds optional time only

description: Time the incubation was harvested/collected/ended. Only relevant for incubation samples.
comments / guidance for external: Time should be entered as HH:MM(:SS) in GMT. See here for a converter: https://www.worldtimebuddy.com/pst-to-gmt-converter
notes: MIxS collection_date accepts (truncated) ISO8601. DH taking seconds optional time only

description: Other details about your sample that you feel can't be accurately represented in the available columns.
Type of filter used or how the sample was filtered
List isotope exposure or addition applied to your sample.
Reference or method used in determining microbial biomass
Reference or method used in determining microbial biomass nitrogen

The part of the organic matter in the soil that constitutes living microorganisms smaller than 5-10 micrometer. If you keep this, you would need to have correction factors used for conversion to the final units

The part of the organic matter in the soil that constitutes living microorganisms smaller than 5-10 micrometer. If you keep this, you would need to have correction factors used for conversion to the final units
Amount of biomass; should include the name for the part of biomass measured, e.g.insect, plant, total. Can include multiple measurements separated by ;
Reference or method used in determining biomass
Method used for obtaining organic nitrogen
Other treatments applied to your samples that are not applicable to the provided fields
Date the incubation was started. Only relevant for incubation samples.
comments / guidance for external: Date should be formatted as YYYY(-MM(-DD)). Ie, 2021-04-15, 2021-04 and 2021 are all acceptable.
notes: MIxS collection_date accepts (truncated) ISO8601. DH taking arb prec date only

description: Time the incubation was started. Only relevant for incubation samples.
comments / guidance for external: Time should be entered as HH:MM(:SS) in GMT. See here for a converter: https://www.worldtimebuddy.com/pst-to-gmt-converter
notes: MIxS collection_date accepts (truncated) ISO8601. DH taking seconds optional time only

description: Select all the data types associated or available for this biosample
Select the MIxS enviromental package that best describes the environment from which your sample was collected.
A unique identifier to assign parent-child, subsample, or sibling samples. This is relevant when a sample or other material was used to generate the new sample.
comments / guidance for external: This field allows multiple entries separated by ; (Examples: Soil collected from the field will link with the soil used in an incubation. The soil a plant was grown in links to the plant sample. An original culture sample was transferred to a new vial and generated a new sample)
